txt.en: You have been tasked with defeating snow-beasts that have been driven into the cavern and destroying their food source.
The mission is complete!\n\nSpeak to Hórin for your reward!

'I have a new mission for you, [placeholder].

'My scouts have come back from one of the caverns that weaves throughout Gundabad. A vicious storm has driven snow-beasts into a large cavern. These caverns serve as a vital passthrough to other needed resources.

'Enter the cavern, drive off the snow-beasts and destroy slop barrels in the cavern!'

Severe storms have driven a wide array of creatures to seek shelter amongst the caverns that dot the outside of Gundabad.   Snow-beasts have taken refuge in a large cavern that serves as a vital passthrough to rich ore deposits throughout the cavern system.\n\nYour mission is to drive off the snow-beasts and destroy their food sources within the cavern.
Some monsters in this mission will attempt a crushing attack, wounding and stunning anyone hit.
Your mission is to drive off the snow-beasts and destroy their food sources through the cavern.\n\nSpeak to Hórin to travel to the cavern where the snow-beasts have been driven.
'Well done! With the cavern cleared of snow-beasts, our forces can secure much needed resources in the fight for Gundabad!'
